cellLineName.title: Cell Line Name
cellLineName.description: Provide the name of the cell line.

organism.title: Organism
organism.description: Enter the organism from which the cell line is derived (e.g., human, mouse).

tissueType.title: Tissue Type
tissueType.description: Specify the tissue type (e.g., liver, lung).

geneticAlterations.title: Genetic Alterations
geneticAlterations.description: List any genetic alterations present in the cell line.

phenotypes.title: Phenotypes
phenotypes.description: List the phenotypes associated with the cell line.

cultureConditions.title: Culture Conditions
cultureConditions.description: Provide details about the culture conditions.

applications.title: Applications
applications.description: List the applications or uses of this cell line.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Provide the availability status (e.g., commercial, academic).

references.title: References
references.description: Provide relevant references (e.g., PubMed ID, DOI).

fundingAgency.title: Funding Agency
fundingAgency.description: Enter the funding agency supporting this cell line.
